movie.title: Let's Be Cops
movie.actors: Jake Johnson, Damon Wayans Jr., Rob Riggle, Nina Dobrev
movie.plot: Two struggling pals dress as police officers for a costume party and become neighborhood sensations. But when these newly-minted "heroes" get tangled in a real life web of mobsters and dirty detectives, they must put their fake badges on the line.
movie.tomatoConsensus: Damon Wayans, Jr. and Jake Johnson have comedic chemistry; unfortunately, Let's Be Cops fails to do anything with it.
